standards.title: Understands the physical characteristics, cultural characteristics, and location of places, regions, and spatial patterns on the Earthâ€™s surface.

components.description: Use maps, satellite images, photographs, and other representations to explain relationships between the locations of places, regions, and spatial patterns.

standards.title: Understands human interaction with the environment.

components.description: Explain how human settlements and movements relate to the location and use of resources in the world.

standards.title: Understands the geographic context of global issues and events.

components.description: Explain the roles of physical and cultural geography in shaping human behavior and world events.
